item.title: U.S. sanctions Iranian, Venezuelan groups tied to weapons trade
item.description: The sanctions come a day after President Donald Trump threatened Iran over attempts to rearm, and amid a monthlong pressure campaign against Venezuela...

item.title: California's Ro Khanna faces Silicon Valley backlash after embracing wealth tax
item.description: A proposal to tax California billionaires at 5% of their wealth could land on the California ballot in November.

item.title: Zelenskyy asks Trump for 50 years of security guarantees, says meeting with Russia possible
item.description: Ukraine's president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, said Monday that he had asked for security guarantees for up to 50 years for Ukraine.
